mapper.select: SELECT a.BOSS_ID , a.BOSS_NM , a.REGION_CD , a.INFO , a.THEME_CD FROM TB_BOSS a WHERE a.BOSS_ID = #{BOSS_ID}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BOSS SET REGION_CD = IFNULL(#{REGION_CD} , REGION_CD ) , INFO = IFNULL(#{INFO} , INFO ) , THEME_CD = IFNULL(#{THEME_CD} , THEME_CD ) WHERE BOSS_ID = #{BOSS_ID}
